title: Where is PES in NIRF ranking?
content: Why is PES apparently not in the ranking list this year?

comments.body: Ranked so high that it's literally off the charts /s
Rvce below msrit shows you how stupid nirf rankings are

PES didn't shell out enough money for NIRF   
hence not in the list
SRM , VIT above IIIT H XD

SRM over BITS pilani

LPU and Sharda, Sathyabama making it to top 100

LPU ranked over NSUT, 
Even Vel tech making it to top 100 in engineering is a joke 

This list has become incredibly hard to trust imo.
But maybe they should because people seeking admissions and companies coming for placements might prefer colleges ranked above in NIRF.

yep maybe, but I was insulting NIRF  
So stupid they are tbh  
Its official govt ranking which shouldn't be bought out

PS: tho I have no proof of them taking money I am just accusing them w/o proof  
since rankings seems complete BS
